Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition ext-R5-MedicationKnowledge.definitional

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..1ExtensionMinimal definition information about the medication
Slices for extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:definition 0..*ExtensionDefinitional resources that provide more information about this medication
value[x] 0..1Reference(MedicinalProductDefinition)Definitional resources that provide more information about this medication
extension:doseForm 0..1Extensionpowder | tablets | capsule +
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptpowder | tablets | capsule +
Binding: SNOMEDCTFormCodes (example)
extension:intendedRoute 0..*ExtensionThe intended or approved route of administration
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptThe intended or approved route of administration
Binding: SNOMEDCTRouteCodes (example)
extension:ingredient 0..*ExtensionActive or inactive ingredient
Slices for extension 1..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:item 1..1ExtensionSubstances contained in the medication
Slices for extension Content/Rules for all slices
extension:_datatype 0..1(Complex)Data type name for MedicationKnowledge.definitional.ingredient.item from FHIR R5
URL: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/_datatype
value[x] 1..1stringValue of extension
Fixed Value: CodeableReference
extension:concept 0..1ExtensionReference to a concept (by class)
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptReference to a concept (by class)
extension:reference 0..1ExtensionReference to a resource (by instance)
value[x] 0..1Reference()Reference to a resource (by instance)
extension:type 0..1ExtensionA code that defines the type of ingredient, active, base, etc
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptA code that defines the type of ingredient, active, base, etc
Binding: RoleClassIngredientEntity (example)
extension:strength[x] 0..1ExtensionQuantity of ingredient present
value[x] 0..1Quantity of ingredient present
Binding: medication-ingredientstrength (??) (example)
valueRatioRatio
valueCodeableConceptCodeableConcept
valueQuantityQuantity
extension:drugCharacteristic 0..*ExtensionSpecifies descriptive properties of the medicine
Slices for extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:type 0..1ExtensionCode specifying the type of characteristic of medication
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptCode specifying the type of characteristic of medication
Binding: medicationKnowledge Characteristic Codes (example)
extension:value[x] 0..1ExtensionDescription of the characteristic
value[x] 0..1Description of the characteristic
valueCodeableConceptCodeableConcept
valueStringstring
valueQuantityQuantity(SimpleQuantity)
valueBase64Binarybase64Binary
valueAttachmentAttachment
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-MedicationKnowledge.definitional"

Documentation for this format

name: ext_R5_MedicationKnowledge_definitional
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationKnowledge.definitional for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationKnowledge.definitional from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationKnowledge|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Minimal definition information about the medication
element.definition: Along with the link to a Medicinal Product Definition resource, this information provides common definitional elements that are needed to understand the specific medication that is being described.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Specifies how many (or how much) of the items there are in this Medication.  For example, 250 mg per tablet.  This is expressed as a ratio where the numerator is 250mg and the denominator is 1 tablet but can also be expressed a quantity when the denominator is assumed to be 1 tablet.
